articles.description: An emotional David Beckham declared his gran would be 'so proud' after his face was beamed onto Buckingham Palace during the Platinum Jubilee concert on Saturday.
articles.content:
An emotional David Beckham declared his gran would be 'so proud' after his face was beamed onto Buckingham Palace during the Platinum Jubilee concert on Saturday.
The former footballer, 47, shared a… [+8304 chars]
